definition: curse it!/to hell with it!
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
(fig.) adaptable/able to deal with various kinds of people and situations/(derog.) insincere/two-faced
pinyin: jian4 ren2 shuo1 ren2 hua4 , jian4 gui3 shuo1 gui3 hua4
containing_words.word: 見人說人話，見鬼說鬼話

sentences.english: I can go to the grocery store because, dammit, you just have to go sometime.
sentences.chinese: 我可以去雜貨店，因爲，見鬼，你有時就是要去一趟。

sentences.english: Where the hell were we going?
sentences.chinese: 見鬼，我們這是要到哪裏去？

sentences.english: Drat , it's raining,my laundry will never get dry.
sentences.chinese: 見鬼，下雨了，我洗的衣服永遠也幹不了了。

sentences.english: Right now, he needed to get to Stephanie, her surly attitude be damned.
sentences.chinese: 目前，他必須找到絲苔妮，讓她粗暴的態度見鬼去。

sentences.english: Shudders Hell thro' all its regions.
sentences.chinese: 在整個區域中見鬼的發抖。

sentences.english: So what the hell are we still doing there?
sentences.chinese: 那我們還見鬼地在那做什麼？

sentences.english: Hell, why not buy all of Manhattan?
sentences.chinese: 見鬼，爲什麼不把曼哈頓全買下來？

sentences.english: "By the deuce," said Boulatruelle, "I'll find him again.
sentences.chinese: “見鬼，”蒲辣禿柳兒想，“我會再找到他的。

sentences.english: Heck, maybe even N. Korea is doing some building in exchange for food and supplies.
sentences.chinese: 見鬼，甚至韓國在建一部分，以換取食物和補給。

sentences.english: Hell, I didn't even know where they were.
sentences.chinese: 見鬼，我甚至不知道他們在那裏。

sentences.english: These 2 guys, Moncler Uomo Gilet, why still a rubbish facial expression?
sentences.chinese: 這兩個傢伙，幹嘛還是一副活見鬼的表情？

sentences.english: Heck, why not protect all of them?
sentences.chinese: 真見鬼，竟然是爲什麼不再多保護一點？

sentences.english: Hell, you're old enough to leave your wife.
sentences.chinese: 見鬼，你已經到了拋棄你妻子的年齡了。

sentences.english: Whatever. Just get drunk and tell her you love her.
sentences.chinese: 見鬼去吧，不如喝得醉醺醺的，告訴她你愛她。

sentences.english: God damn why your face all sweaty?
sentences.chinese: 見鬼了，爲什麼你臉上這麼多汗？

definition: to make a fuss about nothing (idiom)
to rant and rave/to be scared, upset (Beijing dialect)
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
turn out the lights/lights out
repulsive/vile/hateful/abominable
to act recklessly/to mess around
to open one's eyes/to widen one's horizons
to annoy/annoying/irritating/troublesome
to talk nonsense/nonsense!
to lose face/humiliation
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to prescribe medicine/to poison/to slip a drug (into sb's drink etc)
to have one's spirits dampened/to feel disappointed
lit. if it's wrong, it's wrong (idiom); to make the best after a mistake/to accept an error and adapt to it/to muddle through
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
to get oneself a wife/to take a daughter-in-law
